abstract: Social Science Research Network offers nearly 150,000 full-text documents for downloading and allows academics to see how popular their writings are online.
snippet: Social Science Research Network offers nearly 150,000 full-text documents for downloading and allows academics to see how popular their writings are online.
lead_paragraph: FIRST came the Amazon book rankings, and word leaked out that perhaps some vaunted writers spent more time than you would think checking how popular they were, hour by hour. Then newspapers started tracking the most popular articles on their sites and journalists, it was said, spent more time than you would think watching their rankings, hour by hour.

headline.main: Now Professors Get Their Star Rankings, Too
headline.print_headline: Now Professors Get Their Star Rankings, Too
